description:
Harmony aids organizations in the distribution of standards to users and the configuration of applications to use those standards.

Pencil 9 Harmony automates standards and configurations for design and engineering applications.
It's easy to use with just 3 simple steps:
Step 1: Simply tell Harmony where your standards are and where they need to be deployed, alongside any configurations that need to be set.
Step 2: To automate a project in Bentley ProjectWise or Autodesk® BIM 360®, just drop a "Playlist" into the folder.
Step 3: Harmony will automate delivering, updating, and configuring your standard for all project team members.
- Fixed Harmony Autodesk Plugin integration
- Now supports additional special characters in standard definitions
